author: cnbc.com
title: Entravision Communications posts 4Q profit
text:
SANTA MONICA, Calif. (AP) _ Entravision Communications Corp. (EVC) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter net income of $13 million.
The Santa Monica, California-based company said it had profit of 14 cents per share. Losses, adjusted for pretax gains, were 5 cents per share.
The Spanish-language media company posted revenue of $73.5 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported profit of $176.3 million, or $1.92 per share. Revenue was reported as $536 million.
Entravision Communications shares have decreased 12 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $6.30, an increase of nearly 2 percent in the last 12 months.
